entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
